My Expertise

Hi, my name is Albert and I'm a full-time Software Engineer at Qualtrics working on the Reporting Platform team. I build software to help companies improve their product by drawing impactful insights from their customers. When I'm not closing the experience gap or writing code, you can find me reading books about the economy or behavioral psychology.
